title: Big John Products 612011919-S Big John Short Toilet Support, 5" to 7-1/2", White
features: UNIVERSAL FIT: Our Big John Short Swivel Toilet Support works perfectly with elongated toilets and other products, such as raised toilet seats and extra wide toilet seats.
DISCRETE: The Big John Short Swivel Toilet Support mounts underneath the toilet bowl, making it the perfect discrete option for an unobtrusive and non-gaudy toilet support.

1000 POUND CAPACITY: Made of high impact ABS, with a carriage and foot made of a chemical and stain resistant flexible PVC that forms to the contour of the toilet, the Big John Short Swivel Toilet Support can handle up to 1000 pounds of weight, making it a universally applicable toilet support for all individuals.
ECONOMICAL: Unlike many other more intricate and expensive supports, our heavy duty toilet support is the most inexpensive and simple method to prevent a broken toilet.
SPECIFICATIONS: Package includes 1 Big John Short Swivel Toilet Support. Product dimensions: 3 in x 3 in x 7.5 in. Weight: 6.4 lbs.
description: Made of high impact ABS, with a carriage and foot made of a chemical and stain resistant flexible PVC that forms to the contour of the toilet, the Big John Short Swivel Toilet Support is the ideal solution for toilet support. It works perfectly with elongated toilets and other products, such as raised toilet seats and extra wide toilet seats. Our Big John Short Swivel Toilet Support mounts underneath the toilet bowl, making it the perfect discrete option for an unobtrusive and non-gaudy toilet support. It's also the most inexpensive and simple method to prevent a broken toilet.

The secure solution for supporting wall mounted toilets. The Big John Toilet Support mounts underneath the toilet bowl working in conjunction with the existing wall carrier to redistribute the weight and increasing the weight capacity from 350 lbs to over 1000 lbs. Our heavy duty toilet support is the most inexpensive method to prevent a broken toilet. Works perfectly with elongated toilets and other products, such as raised toilet seats and extra wide toilet seats.
